text:
Machine learning has become synonymous
 with innovation

because business,
 societal and environmental problems

that were previously unsolvable
 with software analytics and big data
can now be solved with ML-based practices.

But real change can only happen
 if the reach of machine learning

is democratized and the development of
 machine learning models is industrialized.

Amazon SageMaker allows
 not only data scientists and developers,

but also business and data
 analysts, regardless of their ML expertise

to build, train and deploy machine
 learning models.

Builders
 can use their choice of integrated

development environments
 (or IDEs), low code tools

and no code interfaces
 that best suit their individual skillsets.

SageMaker
 makes it easy to prepare massive amounts

of structured and unstructured data
 for training accurate models.

It also provides optimized infrastructure
 and purpose built tools to automate

and standardize MLOps processes
 to build, train, deploy and manage models

at the scale of hundreds of thousands
 or even millions.

innovation today
 by getting started with Amazon SageMaker.
